cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: Do not lead me(?) to a place of treachery! Rescue me(?)!
Do not forget me(!?) in an empty place! I(!?) am not to be driven from the city(?) towards it(?)
Return for me(!?) “that of disappearance” ... (if?) ... is the angry heart of catastrophe, do not spew poison(?)
look at (my) weeping(?) ... should not touch the true? course/channel/earth(?)
Your(!?) ... should utter my name/nominate me, ... should not abandon (me)
May you pay attention(?), may ... stand/be brought (into) the corner of your eye(?) i.e., your attention?) , may (your?) raised eye sustain (me)
